alert.note: Alert for Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; West Central Tularosa Basin, White Sands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Dona Ana County through 600 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jornada Range, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jornada Range and Portions of Jornada Experimental Range. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Dona Ana County; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; West Central Tularosa Basin, White Sands
